name: Emily Johnson
bio: Emily Johnson is an award-winning chef with over 12 years of experience in the culinary industry. She is passionate about creating dishes that combine traditional flavors with a modern twist.

recipes.cooking_method: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute. 3. Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes. 4. Add curry paste and cook for another minute. 5. Add coconut milk and simmer for 10-15 minutes. 6. Serve hot with rice.

1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add onion and cook until soft. 3. Add garlic and cook for another minute. 4. Add arborio rice and cook for 2 minutes. 5. Add stock, one ladleful at a time, and cook until absorbed. 6. Add mushrooms and cook until rice is tender. 7. Add parmesan cheese and stir. 8. Serve hot.
1. Preheat grill. 2. Brush pork chops with olive oil. 3. Season with salt, pepper, and rosemary. 4. Grill for 5-6 minutes on each side. 5. Serve hot.
